CustomField.formula: LPAD( TEXT( MOD( HOUR(TIMEVALUE(EndTime__c)) - HOUR(TIMEVALUE(StartTime__c)), 24 ) ), 2, '0' ) & ':' & LPAD( TEXT( MOD( MINUTE(TIMEVALUE(EndTime__c)) - MINUTE(TIMEVALUE(StartTime__c)), 60 ) ), 2, '0' ) & ':' & LPAD( TEXT( MOD( SECOND(TIMEVALUE(EndTime__c)) - SECOND(TIMEVALUE(StartTime__c)), 60 ) ), 2, '0' )
CustomField.label: Duration
